definition: tall showy tropical American annual having hairy stems and long spikes of usually red flowers above leaves deeply flushed with purple
details:
noun
- tall showy tropical American annual having hairy stems and long spikes of usually red flowers above leaves deeply flushed with purple
= synonyms: gentleman's-cane, prince's-plume, red amaranth, purple amaranth
- annual with broadly ovate leaves and slender drooping spikes of crimson flowers
= synonyms: prince's-plume, princess feather, kiss-me-over-the-garden-gate
